name: The Maze Moon
description:
THE MAZE MOON

Welcome to ISO-METRICA!

An ISO-METRIC Universe full of mazes! In fact, almost every part of it is a maze!

There are few things to watch out on this ISO-UNIVERS... Time, Gravity, Traps.. and Round things!

Several creatures that live on this ISO-MAZES, and they all have there unic mission in life...

some need to fight gravity, others need to beat the clock! but they all have one thing in common, they need YOU to help them get across the mazes and achieve there main goal!

TO SOLVE A MAZE! (and get rid of those nasty round things!)

Guide the habitants of ISO-METRICA across this ISO-METRIC UNIVERSE & SOLVE THE MAZES!
